summary: This document is an invoice issued to Jeffrey E. Epstein for FedEx services, detailing charges for duty and tax related to a shipment. The invoice includes specific account information, payment details, and references to a shipment made on July 20, 2001.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for FedEx services, indicating his involvement in shipping activities.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as the recipient of a shipment associated with the invoice, indicating a connection to Epstein's shipping activities.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is noted as the recipient of a shipment linked to Jeffrey E. Epstein, suggesting a personal or business relationship.

events.title: Shipment Made
events.description: A shipment was made on July 20, 2001, which is referenced in the invoice as part of the FedEx services provided to Epstein.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 1, 2001, and is associated with account number 1144-2081-6.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $45.08, which includes duty and tax charges.
The shipment referenced in the invoice was made on July 20, 2001.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the recipient of a shipment linked to Epstein.
The document contains multiple pages detailing the charges and payment information.
